src:
Podgoričanke oslabljene u Rumuniji
Budućnost gostuje u Valčei bez najbolje rukometašice, kapitena Milene Raičević i prvog golmana Marine Rajčić

01 Nov 2019

Loše je Budućnost počela Ligu šampiona porazom na svom terenu od francuskog Bresta, ali su Podgorčanke vezale dve pobede i sada imaju šansu da se sa dva boda u Rumuniji približe narednoj rundi rukometne evro elite. Ali, imaće izabranice trenera Dragana Adžića težak zadatak na vrućem gostovanju šampionu ove zemlje Ramniki iz Vlčee (17.30).
Podgoričanke očekuje vruća atmosfera, više od 3.000 domaćih navijača, ali i desetkovan sastav nekadašnjeg šampiona Evrope. Crnogorke neće moći da računaju na najbolju rukometašicu, kapitena Milenu Raičević i prvog golmana Marinu Rajčić, zbog problema sa ramenom, odnosno leđima.
Takođe, i rovita je i odlični strelac Đurđina Jauković. Ona se ove nedelje priključila ekipi posle osam dana mirovanja zbog potresa mozga koju je zadobila baš u prvom odmeravanja snaga ove dve ekipe u Morači. U tom meču, Budućnost je pobedila rumunskog šampiona sa 23:19.
Ovosezonsko pojačanje Podgoričanki iz ĆSM Bukurešta, Slovenka Barbara Lazović dobro poznaje današnjeg rivala.„Svesne smo da nas čeka najteže gostovanje, upravo zbog atmosfere. Vatrena je atmosfera, ali ne možemo i ne smemo da se uplašimo. To mora dodatno da nas motiviše. Lepo je igrati u takvom ambijentu i verujem da ćemo imati dodatnu motivaciju da igramo protiv takve publike. Idemo na pobedu, svaki bod nam znači. Očekujemo agresivnijeg rivala u odbrani, poletnijeg i hrabrijeg u tranziciji. Smatram, ipak, da sve zavisi od nas. Moramo da ponovimo odbranu iz Morače i smanjimo broj tehničkih grešaka“, rekla je Lazovićeva za Vijesti.



ĐER PRVI FAVORIT, BUDUĆNOST PETA






Pobeda bi Podgroričanke dovele na prag naredne runde evro elite. U 11 dosadašnjih utakmica Ramnike i Budućnosti skor je 6:5 za Crnogorke, koje su samo jednom slavile na gostujućem terenu u Vlčei i to u poslednjem duelu pre više od sedam godina, kada je bilo ubedljivh 34:24.
Podgoričanke se uzdaju u najboljeg strelca tima Jovanku Radičević. Ona se letos posle nekoliko godina u Vardaru i ĆSM Bukureštu vratila u Budućnost. Sa 23 golova na tri utakmice je druga na listi strelaca Lige šampiona, sa pogotkom manje od Mađarice iz Ferencvaroša Katrine Gite Klujber. Najefikasnija rukometašica rumunskog šampiona je Dankinja Osterbal Norgard sa 20 golova. U timu Ramnike igra i srpska reprezentativka Kristina Liščević.
Očekuje se kao u Podgorici tvrd meč sa malim brojem golova, a malu prednost dajemo domaćinu zbog povreda dve važne igračice Budućnosti.
Plasman u narednu fazu Lige šampiona obezbediće po tri ekipe iz sve četiri grupe, dok će poslednjeplasirani timovi da nastave takmičenje u Kupu EHF.

text:
Podgorican women weakened in Romania
The future is away in Valcea without the best handball player, captain Milena Raicevic and first goalkeeper Marina Rajcic

01 Nov 2019

Bad Future started the Champions League with a defeat at home to French Brest, but the Podgorcan women tied for two wins and now have a chance of two points in Romania to advance to the next round of the Euro handball elite. However, coach Dragan Adzic will have a difficult task in the hot guest of this country's champion Ramniki from Vlcea (5.30pm).
The Podgorican women are expected to have a hot atmosphere, more than 3,000 local fans, but also a decimated squad of the former European champion. Montenegrins will not be able to count on the best handball player, captain Milena Raicevic and first goalkeeper Marina Rajcic, due to shoulder or back problems.
Also great is the great scorer Djurdjina Jaukovic. She joined the squad this week after eight days of rest due to a concussion she received in the first weighing of the two teams in Moraca. In that match, Future beat the Romanian champion by 23:19.
This season's reinforcement of the CFM from Bucharest CSM, Barbara Barbara Lazovic knows the rivals well today: "We are aware that the toughest guest awaits us, precisely because of the atmosphere. The atmosphere is warm, but we can't and should not be scared. It must further motivate us. It is nice to play in such an environment and I believe we will have additional motivation to play against such an audience. Let's go for the win, every point means to us. We expect a more aggressive rival in defense, a more energetic and courageous transition. I think, though, that everything depends on us. We need to reiterate the Moraca defense and reduce the number of technical errors, "Lazovic told the News.



THE FIRST FAVORITE, THE FUTURE FIFTH






The victory would put the Underground women on the brink of the next round of the Euro elite. In the 11 games of Ramnica and Buducnost so far, the score is 6: 5 for the Montenegrins, who only once celebrated on the away ground in Vlcea, in the last match more than seven years ago, when it was a convincing 34:24.
Podgorican women trust the team's top scorer Jovanka Radicevic. She returned to the Future this summer after several years in Vardar and CSM Bucharest. With 23 goals in three games, she is second on the Champions League goalscorer list, with a score less than Ferencvaros' Hungarian Katrina Gita Klujber. The most effective handball player of the Romanian champion is Dunkina Osterbal Norgard with 20 goals. In the Ramnike team, Serbian national team member Kristina Liscevic also plays.
As in Podgorica, it is expected to be a tough match with a small number of goals, and we give a small advantage to the host due to injuries to two important players of the Future.
Placement in the next phase of the Champions League will be provided by three teams from all four groups, while the last-ranked teams will continue the competition in the EHF Cup.
